Columns.Description: Unique Azure AD tenant ID
Columns.Name: AADTenantId

Columns.Description: The date and time of the event in UTC
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of the operation
Columns.Name: OperationName

Columns.Description: The REST API version that's requested by the client
Columns.Name: OperationVersion

Columns.Description: Category of the event
Columns.Name: Category

Columns.Description: The result of the provisioning operation can be Success, Failure, or Skipped
Columns.Name: ResultType

Columns.Description: Contains the error code, if any, for the provisioning operation
Columns.Name: ResultSignature

Columns.Description: When available, provides the error description for the provisioning operation
Columns.Name: ResultDescription

Columns.Description: Indicates how long this provisioning action took to finish
Columns.Name: DurationMs

Columns.Description: ID to provide provisioning trail
Columns.Name: CorrelationId

Columns.Description: Indicates the activity name or the operation name. For a list of activities logged, refer to Azure AD activity list
Columns.Name: Action

Columns.Description: Unique ID of this change in this cycle
Columns.Name: ChangeId

Columns.Description: Unique ID per job iteration
Columns.Name: CycleId

Columns.Description: Indicates the unique ID for the activity
Columns.Name: Id

Columns.Description: Details of who initiated this provisioning
Columns.Name: InitiatedBy

Columns.Description: The unique ID for the whole provisioning job
Columns.Name: JobId

Columns.Description: Details of each property that was modified in this provisioning action on this object
Columns.Name: ModifiedProperties

Columns.Description: Details of each step in provisioning
Columns.Name: ProvisioningSteps

Columns.Description: Represents the service principal used for provisioning
Columns.Name: ServicePrincipal

Columns.Description: Details of source object being provisioned
Columns.Name: SourceIdentity

Columns.Description: Details of source system of the object being provisioned
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: Details of provisioning status
Columns.Name: StatusInfo

Columns.Description: Details of target object being provisioned
Columns.Name: TargetIdentity

Columns.Description: Details of target system of the object being provisioned
Columns.Name: TargetSystem

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type
